ygData.subject: Re: 7th Level Qeynos Blues
ygData.msgSnippet: Don t know if this will help but here goes. In the Qeynos area you can travel to BlackBurrow ( BB ), the entrance to which is on the Eastern side of the Qeynos
ygData.messageBody:
Don't know if this will help but here goes. In the Qeynos area you can
travel to BlackBurrow ("BB"), the entrance to which is on the Eastern side
of the Qeynos Hills Zone. Gnolls there are good hunting from levels 7 to 15,
more or less. The area is famous, and justly so, for "Trains" so stay near
the zone border at first. Also, strongly suggest you NOT go in hollow tree
to the left of cave exit as you go into BB, hehe.

Grimmoir
> OK. I am a 7th level monk travelling through the Qeynos area on the new
> Tribunal server. I've run into a stump, though. It seems to me that
> everything in the area is now either conning green or conning yellow (few
> and far between). However, if I go to different zones, it's instant red
> cons. Any suggestions on getting over this level hump?
